Plot: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughter's family problems.
Title: Terms of Endearment
Writer: Larry McMurtry (based on the novel by), James L. Brooks (screenplay)
Actors: Shirley MacLaine, Debra Winger, Jack Nicholson, Danny DeVito
tomatoConsensus: A classic tearjerker, Terms of Endearment isn't shy about reaching for the heartstrings -- but is so well-acted and smartly scripted that it's almost impossible to resist.
